title: Liquid Crystal
description: Cat shape-shifter Silje knows her new life in New York, working with covert ops agency Department 57 will be exciting. But she's not expecting Devante and Aristides, the smoking hot Brazilian strippers who want her for their own. [Publisher's Note: This book contains explicit sexual content, graphic language, and situations that some readers may find objectionable: Menage, male/male sexual interaction, violence, sex while in partially shifted form.]
author: Lynne Connolly
